lead_paragraph: Yahoo first publicly disclosed the security breach on Sept. 22 this year, about two months after it struck a $4.8 billion deal with Verizon.
snippet: Yahoo first publicly disclosed the security breach on Sept. 22 this year, about two months after it struck a $4.8 billion deal with Verizon....

headline.main: Yahoo Employees Knew in 2014 About State-Sponsored Hacker Attack
